acid_tooth_dagger.name: Acid-Tooth Dagger
acid_tooth_dagger.desc: On a Perfect hit, a wound attempt in your attack automatically succeeds.

adventure_sword.name: Adventure Sword
adventure_sword.desc: Your courage is added to this weapon's strength.

afterdeath_brew.name: Afterdeath Brew
afterdeath_brew.desc:
a: You consume this and gain 5 bleeding tokens.
During the Aftermath, roll 1d10 for each survivor that died from bleeding tokens. On a 9+, the brew saves their life but makes them deaf.

crafting_process: Boil mixture over heat to remove invasive microbes.
Knead pottery clay to create a cask. Bake, then glaze interior with Love Juice.
Set aside oily residue during skimming. Let cool until waxy then shape to create seal.

almanac.name: Almanac
almanac.desc:
When you depart, gain +2 insanity.
You cannot gain disorders.

amber_edge.name: Amber Edge
amber_edge.desc: At the end of each attack, if you wounded the monster, make an additional attack with this weapon.

amber_poleaxe.name: Amber Poleaxe
amber_poleaxe.desc: When a monster collides with you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster suffers one wound.

ancient_lion_claws.name: Ancient Lion Claws
ancient_lion_claws.desc: +2 strength while attacking with daggers or katars. You may move up to 2 additional spaces when you pounce.

ancient_root.name: Ancient Root
ancient_root.desc: When you are picked as a target while insane, the carrot shrieks fearfully. Roll 1d10. On a 1, the shrill sound stuns you. You are doomed for the rest of the monster's action. On a 6+, the harsh note alerts you. Ignore the first hit of the monster's attack.

recipes.prefix_text: During g Black Harvest, if the Gatherer is insane, they follow a shrill echo in the darkness. A Fleshy stalk quivers in the ground, its muffled shrieking begs to be uprooted. Gain the Ancient Root rare gear.

apostle_crown.name: Apostle Crown
apostle_crown.desc: At the start of your act, if you have any +1 strength tokens, reveal the next 4 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

arc_bow.name: Arc Bow
arc_bow.desc: Cumbersome: Spend c as an additional cost of activating this weapon.

affinity_bonus.desc: Range +2

arm_of_the_first_tree.name: Arm of the First Tree
arm_of_the_first_tree.desc: On a Perfect Hit, the monster gains -1 toughness token until the end of the round. A monster can only suffer this once per round.
arm_of_the_first_tree.selector_text: Arm of the First Tree (Beta Challenge Scenarios)

armor_spikes.name: Armor Spikes
armor_spikes.desc: If adjacent to the monster when you suffer a severe body injury, the monster suffers a wound. Limit, once per round.

bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Remove up to 2 bleeding tokens from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

beacon_shield.name: Beacon Shield
beacon_shield.desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
Block 2: Spend a to ignore 2 hits the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

beast_knuckle.name: Beast Knuckle
beast_knuckle.desc: When you wound with this weapon, monster gains -1 toughness until end of the attack.

belt_of_gender_swap.name: Belt of Gender Swap
belt_of_gender_swap.desc: While in your gear grid, change to the opposite sex.

bird_bread.name: Bird Bread
bird_bread.desc: a Consume: Once per showdown, add 1 to all hit locations. Gain priority target token. Roll 1d10. On a 1, reduce your survival to 0.

black_friday_lantern.desc: On Arrival (at the start of the showdown), you may archive this and ambush the monster. limit, once per campaign.
black_friday_lantern.name: Black Friday Lantern

footnote.desc: This gains +10 strength when attacking a monster with 10+ toughness.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Deflect 1

crafting_process: Boil Nightmare Corn in Dark Water over Heat to create syrup infused with paranoia.
Isolate a survivor with +10 insanity in a hovel with the dagger. Their deranged outbursts will chip the dagger, revealing its final shape.
A survivor with Blotted Out consumes the syrup. Their inevitable regurgitation of of syrup and fearful bile is used to patinate the weapon.

black_sword.name: Black Sword
black_sword.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival. If you are a Sword Master, you understand this weapon's potential. It gains +20 strength.

blast_shield.name: Blast Shield
blast_shield.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Block 1. The first time you block a hit each showdown, gain the priority target token.

blast_sword.name: Blast Sword
blast_sword.desc: When you spend <font class="kdm_font">a</font> to block with this weapon, gain +1 survival.

blood_paint.name: Blood Paint
blood_paint.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Activate weapon gear to the left and right of this card. These are two separate attacks. Cannot be used with two-handed weapons.

blood_plasma_gun.name: Blood Plasma Gun
blood_plasma_gun.desc: When you activate this, gain 1 bleeding token. X = your bleeding tokens. Z = X + X + X + X + X

blood_plasma_katana.name: Blood Plasma Katana
blood_plasma_katana.desc: When you activate this, gain 1 bleeding token. X = your bleeding tokens minus 2.

blood_sheath.name: Blood Sheath
blood_sheath.desc: When Rainbow Katana is left of Blood Sheath, it loses Frail and gains Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt).

bloodskin.name: Bloodskin
bloodskin.desc: When you depart, you fill the bloodskin and gain 2 bleeding tokens. At the start of each of each of your acts, remove 1 bleeding token.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you are picked as a target, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster must pick a new target, if possible.
Unshakeable: When you draw a Trap, roll 1d10. On a 6+, discard the Trap and reshuffle the deck.

blue_lantern.name: Blue Lantern
blue_lantern.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Suffer 2d10 brain damage and reveal HL cards until you reveal the the trap. Put them back in the same order. Limit, once per showdown.

blue_power_core.name: Blue Power Core
blue_power_core.desc: All nuclear gear cards in your gear grid gain Deadly 2.

affinity_bonus.desc: If you are the monster controller when the monster draws <font class="kdm_font_10">b</font>, draw 1 extra card. Select 1 to play and discard the other.

bone_axe.name: Bone Axe
bone_axe.desc: Savage: Once per attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. This effect does not apply to impervious hit locations.

bone_blade.name: Bone Blade
bone_blade.desc:
Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks.
Archive this card at the end of the attack.

bone_club.name: Bone Club
bone_club.desc: Cumbersome: Spend c as an additional cost to activate this weapon. Ignore Cumbersome if this weapon is activated indirectly (Pounce, Charge, etc.).

bone_dagger.name: Bone Dagger
bone_dagger.desc:
On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival.
Perfect Hit: An attack roll result of a lantern 10.

bone_darts.name: Bone Darts
bone_darts.desc: Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

bone_earrings.name: Bone Earrings
bone_earrings.desc: At the start of the showdown, gain +2 speed and +2 strength tokens if insane and all gear in your gear grid has the bone keyword.

bone_pickaxe.name: Bone Pickaxe
bone_pickaxe.desc: After Hunt phase setup, place the Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

bone_sickle.name: Bone Sickle
bone_sickle.desc: After Hunt phase setup, place the Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

affinity_bonus.desc: At the start of your act, you may spend 3 insanity to gain 1 survival or 1 survival to gain 3 insanity.

boss_mehndi.name: Boss Mehndi
boss_mehndi.desc: Boss is brave. While adjacent to you, insane survivors gain +1 speed.

brain_mint.name: Brain Mint
brain_mint.desc: a Consume: Remove all your tokens and stand up. You may use this while knocked down. Use once per showdown.

brave_dirndl.name: Brave Dirndl
brave_dirndl.desc: Once per lifetime, when you are a returning survivor and this is the only armor you are wearing, gain +1 courage. If your settlement has Song of the Brave, gain +1 permanent strength too!

crafting_process: Hear gleeful music of a returning survivor with an instrument to inspire design.
Reclaim hardware from Skullcap Hammer for motions used throughout ensemble.
Use Bone Sickle to properly size choker and armlet accessories.

brazen_bat.name: Brazen Bat
brazen_bat.desc:
Gains Sharp when attacking 🎃 monsters.
If you are not wearing any head armor, you feel a spirit of rebellion! You may ignore the first e during your first attack each round.

crafting_process: Create a lathe with spare bones. A survivor with Rhythm Chaser cranks it.
Use Scrap Smelting to heat lantern shards and place in a pile.
Crush Dried Acanthus and mix with urine to create a sealant.

bug_trap.name: Bug Trap
bug_trap.desc: At the start of the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 3+, add a Bug Patch terrain card to the showdown board.

butcher_cleaver.name: Butcher Cleaver
butcher_cleaver.desc:
Sentient: Must be insane to activate.
Irreplaceable: When you die, archive this card.

affinity_bonus.desc: For every 10 insanity you have, gain +1 speed and +1 strength.

calcified_digging_claw.name: Calcified Digging Claw
calcified_digging_claw.desc: During the Mineral Gathering story event, you may reroll one of your d10.

calcified_greaves.name: Calcified Greaves
calcified_greaves.desc: -1 movement. Add <font class="inline_shield">3</font> to all hit locations.

affinity_bonus.desc: Add +2 to Ripple Pattern roll results.

calcified_juggernaut_blade.name: Calcified Juggernaut Blade
calcified_juggernaut_blade.desc: This weapon gains +1 strength for each token you have.

calcified_shoulder_pads.name: Calcified Shoulder Pads
calcified_shoulder_pads.desc: Add <font class="inline_shield">3</font> to all hit locations.

affinity_bonus.desc: Ripple Pattern: When you are attacked, roll 1d10. On a 10+, ignore 1 hit.
Gains Devastating 1: Whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.

cat_eye_circlet.name: Cat Eye Circlet
cat_eye_circlet.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Reveal the next 3 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a perfect hit, gain +1 strength token. When knocked down, remove all your +1 strength tokens.

cat_gut_bow.name: Cat Gut Bow
cat_gut_bow.desc: Aim: When you attack, before rolling to hit, you may reduce the speed of this weapon by 1 to gain +2 accuracy for that attack.

celestial_spear.name: Celestial Spear
celestial_spear.desc: Gain +5 strength when attacking with this weapon if you have a constellation.

century_greaves.name: Century Greaves
century_greaves.desc: -1 movement. Add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations.

affinity_bonus.desc: Add +1 to Ripple Pattern roll results.

century_shoulder_pads.name: Century Shoulder Pads
century_shoulder_pads.desc: Add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations.

affinity_bonus.desc: Ripple Pattern: When you are attacked, roll 1d10. On a 10+, ignore 1 hit.

claw_head_arrow.name: Claw Head Arrow
claw_head_arrow.desc:
Slow, Ammo-Bow: You must have a bow in your gear grid to activate this.
If you hit, monster gains -1 evasion token. Use once per showdown.

cloth.name: Cloth
cloth.desc: The Cloth protects your waist. Gain 1 armor point at the waist hit location.

cloth_leggings.name: Cloth Leggings
cloth_leggings.desc: When you suffer the Bleeding or Bloody thighs severe injuries, only gain 1 bleeding token.

cola_bottle_lantern.name: Cola Bottle Lantern
cola_bottle_lantern.desc:
+1 Accuracy
a: All survivors gain +1 Accuracy until the end of the round. Use once per round.

affinity_bonus.desc: After moving from a dash, the coat fires its guns! It attacks with this profile, ignoring your attribute modifiers (4/9/8).

recipes.misc: When a Savior shares a well told dream during se Weird Dream add Corsair Coat rare gear to settlement storage.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Devastating 1: Whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.

crest_crown.name: Crest Crown
crest_crown.desc: a: If insane, reshuffle hit location deck.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you depart, gain +1 insanity and +1 survival for every <font class="kdm_font_2 affinity_blue_text">h</font> you have.

cycloid_scale_armor.name: Cycloid Scale Armor
cycloid_scale_armor.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Prismatic: Your complete affinities and incomplete affinity halves count as all colors.

cycloid_scale_hood.name: Cycloid Scale Hood
cycloid_scale_hood.desc: Whenever you spend <font class="kdm_font">c</font>, the scales' colors shift. Gain +1 evasion until your next act.

cycloid_scale_jacket.name: Cycloid Scale Jacket
cycloid_scale_jacket.desc: When you spend c, you Shadow Walk and may move through spaces survivors occupy without causing collision.

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 Accuracy
c: You are not a threat until you attack. If you have the priority target token, gain +2 survival and remove it.
When you depart, gain survival equal to the number of ■ you have.

cycloid_scale_sleeves.name: Cycloid Scale Sleeves
cycloid_scale_sleeves.desc: When you Shadow Walk and attack a monster from its blind spot, your weapon gains +1 accuracy and Sharp for that attack.

dbk_errant_badge.name: DBK Errant Badge
dbk_errant_badge.desc: Add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations. At the start of the showdown, draw 1 tactics card.

dark_water_vial.name: Dark Water Vial
dark_water_vial.desc: a Consume: You are knocked down and cannot gain bleeding tokens until the end of the round. Use once per showdown.

death_mask.name: Death Mask
death_mask.desc: If you have no affinities, gain +4 luck and suffer -4 to all severe injury rolls.

death_mehndi.name: Death Mehndi
death_mehndi.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain 1d10 insanity. -4 to all brain trauma rolls.

deathpact.name: Deathpact
deathpact.desc:
At the start of your act, gain +1 survival.
Once per campaign, you may fire the gun to automatically hit and inflict a critical wound.

dense_bone_arrows.name: Dense Bone Arrows
dense_bone_arrows.desc: (You depart with enough arrows to last. There is no activation limit.)
dense_bone_arrows.selector_text: Dense Bone Arrows (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

affinity_bonus.desc: When attacking from the blind spot, the attack gains +2 strength and the first successful wound attempt gains devastating 1.

detective_cap.name: Detective Cap
detective_cap.desc: You must investigate if a choice to investigate arises. When you would roll to investigate, pick any result. If you are a returning survivor, you leave your hardboiled life behind and retired.

digging_claw.name: Digging Claw
digging_claw.desc: During the Mineral Gathering story event, you may reroll one of your d10.

dormant_twilight_cloak.name: Dormant Twilight Cloak
dormant_twilight_cloak.desc: Ignore sentient on all gear. You cannot depart with this if you have 3+ understanding.

dragon_armor_set.name: Dragon Armor Set
dragon_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Charge: Spend c a. You leap into the air! Place your survivor on an unoccupied space exactly five spaces away in a straight line, then activate a melee weapon and attack with +2 accuracy and +5 strength.

affinity_bonus.desc: You are not knocked down from suffering a heavy injury.

dragon_bite_bolt.name: Dragon Bite Bolt
dragon_bite_bolt.desc: If you wound the monster, it suffers knockback 5. Use once per showdown.

dragon_chakram.name: Dragon Chakram
dragon_chakram.desc: If you hit, the monster gains -1 evasion until the end of the round. Limit, once per attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: At the start of the showdown, you beat your chest mightily and gain survival up to the survival limit.

dragon_slayer.name: Dragon Slayer
dragon_slayer.desc: Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

dragon_vestments.name: Dragon Vestments
dragon_vestments.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
When you gain a random fighting art, select a Dragon Trait one instead.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gain +1 to all severe b injury roll results. Ignore shattered jaw severe b injury result.

dried_acanthus.name: Dried Acanthus
dried_acanthus.desc: When you depart, gain +2 survival. When you suffer a severe injury, ignore it and archive this card instead.

durendal.name: Durendal
durendal.desc: When you depart with  <font class="inline_shield">1</font> or less at each hit location (after all other departing bonuses), add armor equal to your courage to all hit locations.

crafting_process: Eavesdrop on a sleeping savior to determine the blade's dimensions.
Create custom Blacksmith tools with material from the other.
Collect bile off a returning survivor who was Regurgitated to cure leather.

dying_lantern.name: Dying Lantern
dying_lantern.desc: You may archive this to gain 1 Skull basic resource and +3 insanity.

elder_earrings.name: Elder Earrings
elder_earrings.desc: At the start of the showdown, gain +2 survival. +1 Hunt XP after a showdown.

excalibur.name: Excalibur
excalibur.desc: When you die, you cease to exist (ignore death principle) and this gains +2 permanent strength (note this on the settlement record sheet).

eye_patch.name: Eye Patch
eye_patch.desc: While you wear this, you are blind in one eye (-1 accuracy), if you are already blind, gain +2 strength for being a badass instead.

fairy_bottle.name: Fairy Bottle
fairy_bottle.desc: When you would die for any reason, instead restore all lost armor points and health levels, remove all bleeding tokens and archive this card.

feather_mantle.name: Feather Mantle
feather_mantle.desc: When you suffer knockback, you may ignore collision with other survivors and reduce movement by up to 3 spaces.

affinity_bonus.desc: Reduce any suffered brain damage by 1 to a minimum of 1.

fecal_salve.name: Fecal Salve
fecal_salve.desc:
When you depart, gain +1 survival
a: You are not a threat until you attack. If you have the priority target token, remove it.

fetorsaurus.name: Fetorsaurus
fetorsaurus.desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
While you carry this, reduce ★ by 1.

final_lantern.name: Final Lantern
final_lantern.desc: On Arrival, all survivors gain the Horripilation survivor status card. (See the Watcher's AI Deck.) When not insane, flip this card.

affinity_bonus.desc: As long as you have 5+ survival, gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength.

first_aid_kit.name: First Aid Kit
first_aid_kit.desc:
On Arrival, all survivors gain +3 survival.
a: Remove 1 bleeding or negative attribute token from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

flower_knight_badge.name: Flower Knight Badge
flower_knight_badge.desc: At the start of the showdown, draw 1 tactics card and gain +1 evasion token.

affinity_bonus.desc: While you are being attacked the monster has -1 speed.

forsaker_mask.name: Forsaker Mask
forsaker_mask.desc:
During the Aftermath, you run off into the darkness never to be seen again.
During the Settlement Phase, you may archive this item to build the Mask Maker location.

founding_stone.name: Founding Stone
founding_stone.desc:
Spend a to sling the stone from anywhere on the board! Archive this card for 1 automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.
Archive: Return this card to the game box.

frenzy_drink.name: Frenzy Drink
frenzy_drink.desc: a Consume: Suffer Frenzy brain trauma. Can be used once per showdown.

gaxe.name: Gaxe
gaxe.desc: Each showdown, the first time you critically wound the monster, it gains -1 evasion token.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains +1 speed and Savage

giant_stone_face.name: Giant Stone Face
giant_stone_face.desc: If your attack roll result is a 1, archive this card and place a Giant Stone Face terrain tile in any adjacent square.

gloom_bracelets.name: Gloom Bracelets
gloom_bracelets.desc: When you depart, gain +2 insanity. When you suffer a severe arm injury, archive this card.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you Depart, gain -3 Hunt XP, -1 understanding. If you have no understanding, die instantly.

gloom_hammer.name: Gloom Hammer
gloom_hammer.desc: When you wound, end your attack (cancel reactions). Gain the monster controller tile and full move the monster directly away from you.

gloom_katana.name: Gloom Katana
gloom_katana.desc: Your insanity is added to this weapon's strength. When Gloom Sheath is right of this in your gear grid, Gloom Katana gains Savage.

gloom_mehndi.name: Gloom Mehndi
gloom_mehndi.desc: When you depart, gain 1 to all hit locations. When you gain the Crystal Skin ability, gain the Crystal Sword Mold strange resource.

affinity_bonus.desc: At the start of your act, gain +1 insanity.

gloom_coated_arrow.name: Gloom-Coated Arrow
gloom_coated_arrow.desc: After attempting to wound each hit location, place it on top of the deck instead of in the discard pile. Use once per showdown.

affinity_bonus.desc: +2 accuracy. You are deaf. You cannot encourage.

gods_string.name: God's String
gods_string.desc: When a bow is below God's string, it gains sharp, and its range is increased by 1.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you depart, gain + 2 to all locations wearing fur armor.

gorment_boots.name: Gorment Boots
gorment_boots.desc: Other survivors may move through but not end movement in a space you occupy.

affinity_bonus.desc: If your courage is higher than ★, ignore intimidate actions.
You may Guard without spending survival.
Guard: At the end of your attack, if you are standing and have a shield in your gear grid, spend 1 survival to move 3 spaces directly away from the monster and Block 1 for free.

gorn.name: Gorn
gorn.desc:
a: All non-deaf knocked down survivors stand and gain +1 to all hit locations.
Use once per showdown.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack.

green_boots.name: Green Boots
green_boots.desc: You may use the Tumble fighting art.

affinity_bonus.desc: You successfully tumble on 2+ instead of 6+.
Undeathable: If you would die, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you inexplicably survive.
After drawing hit locations from an attack, you may discard 1 First Strike hit location card.
+6 Luck when attempting to wound Parry hit locations.

green_helm.name: Green Helm
green_helm.desc:
+1 Luck.
When a monster attacks you, you may elect to take a hit on the head and roll 1d10. On a 6+, ignore the hit. If adjacent, it suffers 1 wound.

recipes.misc: Old Master on the settlement's Quarry List.

green_plate.name: Green Plate
green_plate.desc: At the start of the showdown, draw 3 tactics cards.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you attack, the extra weight grants leverage. Your weapon gains the club keyword.
The first time you are attacked each round, gain <font class="inline_shield">3</font> to all hit locations if you are monster controller.

grim_muffler.name: Grim Muffler
grim_muffler.desc: One of your gear loses the noisy keyword, as you hide it in this cloak.

affinity_bonus.desc: Ignore survival loss from cold hunt events.

crafting_process: Harvest healthy tendons from a fresh Organ obtained last showdown.
Pluck hairs from 15 survivors. One fidgets too much, record Bald on their sheet.
Plug a sleeping survivor's ears with hair and scream to test sound suppression.

grinning_visage.desc:
When you wound with this shield, you may spend 1 survival to add 1 to all hit locations.
Limit, once per attack.
grinning_visage.name: Grinning Visage

griswaldo.name: Griswaldo
griswaldo.desc: When you wound, Block 2 with Fetorsaurus for free.

affinity_bonus.desc: Ignore the first severe injury you suffer each showdown.

hazmat_shield.name: Hazmat Shield
hazmat_shield.desc: Add 2 to all hit locations. When the monster performs Unseen Agony or Meltdown, roll 1d10. On a 2+, you suffer no damage.

healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.desc: At the end of the showdown, if you suffered any permanent injuries, you may archive this card and remove one of your choice.

hidden_crimson_jewel.name: Hidden Crimson Jewel
hidden_crimson_jewel.desc: Once per game phase, you may reroll one d10.

hollow_sword.name: Hollow Sword
hollow_sword.desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

hollowpoint_arrow.name: Hollowpoint Arrow
hollowpoint_arrow.desc: On a hit, monster gains -1 movement token. Use once per showdown.

hooded_scrap_katar.name: Hooded Scrap Katar
hooded_scrap_katar.desc: If you hit 4 or more times in a single attack with this weapon, the monster suffers 1 wound before hit locations are drawn.

hooked_claw_knife.name: Hooked Claw Knife

affinity_bonus.desc: When your wound causes a reaction where the monster moves, you tear a chunk of flesh out! It suffers a wound.

hooked_claw_knife.selector_text: Hooked Claw Knife (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

hope_stealer.name: Hope Stealer
hope_stealer.desc: At the end of the showdown, you die. Your settlement's death count is added to this weapon's strength.

recipes.prefix_text:
If you're insane when you pull the Adventure Sword from the grimacing stone face, you hear a distant cackle.
You're holding a much different weapon!
Gain the Hope Stealer instead.
(Hunt Event 85)

hours_ring.name: Hours Ring
hours_ring.desc: Do not gain any tokens for any reason. Do not gain Hunt XP or weapon proficiency. Retired wearers can depart.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, discard 1 mood in play.

hunters_heart.name: Hunter's Heart
hunters_heart.desc:
If you die, the heart crawls back to the settlement. Roll 1d10. On a 7+, it regrows you.
During the settlement phase, you may archive this to g Bleeding Heart.

husk_of_destiny.name: Husk of Destiny
husk_of_destiny.desc: Your destiny is fulfilled. You are always Insane.

ink_blood_bow.name: Ink Blood Bow
ink_blood_bow.desc: Gains +1 strength for each bleeding token you have. Loses cumbersome when in darkness.

ink_sword.name: Ink Sword
ink_sword.desc: You may only attack with this while ind arkness.

jack_o_lantern.name: Jack O' Lantern
jack_o_lantern.desc: During the showdown, if you are, insane, when a survivor dies, gain +10 survival.

knuckle_shield.name: Knuckle Shield
knuckle_shield.desc: Once per round, if you wound with this weapon, Block 1 for free.

lance_of_longinus.name: Lance of Longinus
lance_of_longinus.desc: Each showdown, the first time you wound, the monster gains a -1 toughness token.

lantern_armor_set.name: Lantern Armor Set
lantern_armor_set.desc:
You feel invincible. On Arrival, gain survival up to the survival limit.
The extra weight is leverage. All clubs in your gear grid gain Sharp.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you depart, add 3 to all hit locations with metal armor.

lantern_dagger.name: Lantern Dagger
lantern_dagger.desc:
Sharp: Add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt.
Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: +2 accuracy with club weapons.

lantern_glaive.name: Lantern Glaive
lantern_glaive.desc:
Sharp: Add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt.
Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: +2 movement.

lantern_halberd.name: Lantern Halberd
lantern_halberd.desc: After attacking, if standing, you may move up to 2 spaces directly away from the monster.

affinity_bonus.desc: Ear Plugs. You are deaf, -1 accuracy.
You may start the showdown in any unoccupied board space.

lantern_sword.name: Lantern Sword
lantern_sword.desc:
Sharp: Add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt.
Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

leather_armor_set.name: Leather Armor Set
leather_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
You ignore bash.

affinity_bonus.desc: At the end of your act, you may move 1 space.

life_elixir.name: Life Elixir
life_elixir.desc: Each showdown, the first time you would die from a severe injury, ignore that injury.

lion_beast_katar.name: Lion Beast Katar
lion_beast_katar.desc:
Deadly: +1 luck with this weapon.
Paired: When you attack, add the speed of a 2nd Lion Beast Katar in your gear grid.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gain +1 strength for each <font class="affinity_red_text">■</font> you have.

lion_headdress.name: Lion Headdress
lion_headdress.desc: Accessory: You may wear this in addition to 1 armor at this hit location

lion_skin_cloak.name: Lion Skin Cloak
lion_skin_cloak.desc: Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

lion_slayer_cape.name: Lion Slayer Cape
lion_slayer_cape.desc: On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 survival. If you are wearing fur armor, reduce all damage suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.
lion_slayer_cape.selector_text: Lion Slayer Cape (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

lovelorn_rock.name: Lovelorn Rock
lovelorn_rock.selector_text: Lovelorn Rock (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 luck
Ignore the first severe <font class="kdm_font_2">b</font> injury you suffer each showdown.
+1 evasion
+1 strength

muramasa.name: Muramasa
muramasa.desc: When you critically wound with this weapon, gain 2 bleeding tokens.

musk_bomb.name: Musk Bomb
musk_bomb.desc: If adjacent to monster when it draws <font class="kdm_font_10">b</font>, you may spend 2 survival and archive Musk Bomb to roll 1d10. On a 3+, discard <font class="kdm_font_10">b</font> without playing it.

affinity_bonus.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Reveal the next 4 monster hit locations. Put them back in any order.

newborn.name: Newborn
newborn.desc: While you have this, all your weapons gain Slow. When you return to the settlement, archive this and gain +1 population.

nightmare_breast_pump.name: Nightmare Breast Pump
nightmare_breast_pump.desc: The pump mimics a baby's cries, stimulating your milk glands. As a returning survivor, gain +1 to your intimacy rolls this settlement phase.

affinity_bonus.desc: a: Edge ignites! Suffer 3 brain damage. Your next attack with this weapon gains devastating 1. Limit, once per round.
a: Edge ignites! Suffer 3 brain damage. Your next attack with this weapon gains devastating 1. Limit, once per round.

oxidized_beacon_shield.name: Oxidized Beacon Shield
oxidized_beacon_shield.desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
Deflect 2: Spend a. You now have exactly 2 deflect tokens. The next 2 times you are hit, ignore a hit and and lose 1 deflect token.

oxidized_beast_katar.name: Oxidized Beast Katar

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength for this attack.

oxidized_beast_katar.selector_text: Oxidized Beast Katar (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival.
On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. This weapon gains +4 strength for this attack.
If you are not deaf, you may ignore effects that target non-deaf survivors.

oxidized_lantern_sword.name: Oxidized Lantern Sword
oxidized_lantern_sword.desc: Deflect 1: Spend a. You now have exactly 1 deflect token. The next 1 time you are hit, ignore a hit and and lose 1 deflect token.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Provoke (see Rawhide Whip).

petal_lantern.name: Petal Lantern
petal_lantern.desc: After rolling on the severe injury table, you may spend any amount of survival to add that number to your roll result.

phoenix_armor_set.name: Phoenix Armor Set
phoenix_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Charge: Spend c a, full move in a straight line. At the end of the movement, activate a melee weapon and attack. Add the number of spaces you moved to your strength for the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: If insane at the start of the showdown, gain +1 evasion token.
If insane, ignore the first hit each round and suffer 1 brain damage instead.

plated_shield.name: Plated Shield
plated_shield.desc: Sharp while you have any deflect tokens.

crafting_process: Compare blood pooling in a stone eye socket to blood running off Stone Noses.
Remove impact-absorbing material from a Round Leater Shield.
Polish spiral scrap plating with Monster Grease while wearing metal arm armor.

portcullis_key.name: Portcullis Key
portcullis_key.desc: This is the key to the portcullis. Without it, you will never get through.

power_potion.name: Power Potion
power_potion.desc: a Consume: Once per showdown, gain +1 strength token for each ■ you have.

prism_mace.name: Prism Mace
prism_mace.desc: When you wound with this you may block 1 for free and discard 1 mood in play if you have any +1 strength tokens.

prismatic_lantern.name: Prismatic Lantern
prismatic_lantern.desc: During the showdown, you may archive this and gain 1 permanent affinity of any color.

pulse_lantern.name: Pulse Lantern
pulse_lantern.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Once per showdown, roll 1d10. On a result of 4+, the monster is knocked down and all survivors gain -1 accuracy token.

quiver_and_sunstring.name: Quiver and Sunstring
quiver_and_sunstring.desc: You may carry up to 3 arrow gear cards outside of your grid. (All arrows you carry must be different.)

affinity_bonus.desc: All your bows gain +2 range.
Gains Deadly.
When any of your attack rolls are 1, you may reroll them. Limit, once per attack.

raptor_worm_collar.name: Raptor-Worm Collar
raptor_worm_collar.desc: You may encourage without spending survival. When you encourage a survivor, they suffer 2 brain damage.

rawhide_armor_set.name: Rawhide Armor Set
rawhide_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
When you perform a survival action, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, gain +1 survival.

rawhide_drum.name: Rawhide Drum
rawhide_drum.desc:
On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 insanity.
Inspirational drumming! When you perform encourage, all non-deaf survivors are affected.

affinity_bonus.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: reveal the top 2 <font class="kdm_font_10">b</font>. Place them back on top of the deck in any order.
+1 Evasion

rawhide_whip.name: Rawhide Whip
rawhide_whip.desc: Provoke: When you wound with this weapon, gain the priority target token.

affinity_bonus.desc: Unstoppable: When you attempt to wound, instead roll 1d10. On a 1-5 fail. On 6-10, wound.

red_power_core.name: Red Power Core
red_power_core.desc: All nuclear gear cards in your gear grid gain Sharp.

affinity_bonus.desc: If you gain a bleeding token while monster controller, monster suffers 1 wound. Limit twice per round.

regal_edge.name: Regal Edge
regal_edge.desc: Gain +1 speed and +4 strength when attacking with this weapon if you have a Constellation.

regenerating_blade.name: Regenerating Blade
regenerating_blade.desc: During the Settlement Phase, you may archive this to remove the Dismembered Arm or Dismembered Leg permanent injury from one survivor.

affinity_bonus.desc: At the end of the showdown, remove any permanent injuries you suffered this showdown.
Gains Sharp, +1 Evasion.

reverberating_lantern.name: Reverberating Lantern
reverberating_lantern.desc: At the start of any hunt turn, before an event is revealed, you may g Sonorous Rest. Limit, once per hunt.

ring_whip.name: Ring Whip
ring_whip.desc: Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

riot_mace.name: Riot Mace
riot_mace.desc: When you critically wound, the next time a monster would draw AI, it performs Basic Action instead.

round_leather_shield.name: Round Leather Shield
round_leather_shield.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Block 1: Spend a to ignore 1 hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

rubber_bone_harness.name: Rubber Bone Harness
rubber_bone_harness.desc: Once per showdown, you may convert all of your negative attribute tokens to positive attribute tokens of the same type.

satchel.name: Satchel
satchel.desc: You may depart with one resource card. If that resource is Perishable, it is not destroyed.

scarab_circlet.name: Scarab Circlet
scarab_circlet.desc: Add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations. During the showdown, when your survival is reduced to 0, gain +1 strength token.

scavenger_kit.name: Scavenger Kit
scavenger_kit.desc: When you defeat a monster, gain either 1 random basic resource or 1 random monster resource from that monster's resource deck.

scouts_tunic.name: Scout's Tunic
scouts_tunic.desc: Takes the place of the Leather Mask and Leather Cuirass for completing the leather armor set.

scrap_dagger.name: Scrap Dagger
scrap_dagger.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +2 strength for the rest of the attack.

scrap_shield.name: Scrap Shield
scrap_shield.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Block 1: Spend a to ignore 1 hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

scrap_sword.name: Scrap Sword
scrap_sword.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Deadly.

screaming_armor_set.name: Screaming Armor Set
screaming_armor_set.desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
Skewer: After you slam, spend a to move 1 space and activate a melee weapon with +2 strength. If you wound with a spear, apply that wound roll result to the next selected hit location this attack.

screaming_bracers.name: Screaming Bracers
screaming_bracers.desc: On Arrival, if possible, add an Acanthus Plant terrain card to the showdown. When you activate terrain, you may add +2 to your roll result.

screaming_coat.name: Screaming Coat
screaming_coat.desc: Slam: Spend c to full move forward in a straight line. If you move 4+ spaces and stop adjacent to a monster, it suffers knockback 1 and -1 toughness until the end of the round.

screaming_horns.name: Screaming Horns
screaming_horns.desc: a: Scream. Non-deaf insane survivors gain +1 movement until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.

screaming_leg_warmers.name: Screaming Leg Warmers
screaming_leg_warmers.desc: On Arrival your feet hurt. Gain +3 insanity.

screaming_skirt.name: Screaming Skirt
screaming_skirt.desc: Thick, protective fur protects your parts. Add +1 to severe waist injury roll results.

affinity_bonus.desc: a Consume: Gain +3 survival and +1 strength token. Limit, once per showdown.

shadow_saliva_shawl.name: Shadow Saliva Shawl

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 Evasion. All weapons gain slow

shadow_saliva_shawl.desc: Cannot ear if you have heavy, soluble, or shield gear, or any gear with <font class="inline_shield">3</font> or higher printed on it.

shielded_quiver.name: Shielded Quiver
shielded_quiver.desc: You may activate and gain the benefits of each arrow gear in your grid one additional time each showdown.

silk_armor_set.name: Silk Armor Set
silk_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Whenever you are attacked, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 hit location dice to the result of your choice.

silk_body_suit.name: Silk Body Suit
silk_body_suit.desc: Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 2, to a minimum of 1. You may not have any heavy or metal armor in your gear grid.

silk_bomb.name: Silk Bomb
silk_bomb.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Until the end of the round, all survivors ignore knockback and bash. Archive after use.

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 movement. Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to gain 2 insanity.
<font class="kdm_font">a</font>: add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations. Use once per showdown.
<font class="kdm_font">a</font>: add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations. Use once per showdown.
<font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Turn the monster to face away from you. Use only during the survivors' turn.
On a Perfect hit, you may archive a mood in play instead of drawing a hit location.

skleaver.name: Skleaver
skleaver.desc: On the first Perfect hit each attack, this gains devastating 1 until the end of the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: Loses the heavy keyword

skull_helm.name: Skull Helm
skull_helm.desc: When you suffer a severe head injury, the Skull Helm is destroyed. Archive this card.

skullcap_hammer.name: Skullcap Hammer
skullcap_hammer.desc: On a Perfect Hit, the monster is dazed, and gains -1 speed token until the end of its turn. A monster can be dazed once per round.

sky_harpoon.name: Sky Harpoon
sky_harpoon.desc: Once per showdown, if monster is in reach, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you skewer it! It suffers 1 wound. Move it up to 3 spaces towards you.

sleeping_virus_flower.name: Sleeping Virus Flower
sleeping_virus_flower.desc: When you die, a flower bloomes from your corpse. Add g A Warm Virus to the timeline next year. You are the guest.

affinity_bonus.desc: Monsters and survivors adjacent to you have -1 luck.

sonic_tomahawk.name: Sonic Tomahawk
sonic_tomahawk.desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gain Savage and Paired
While insane, and not wearing armor or accessories, gain +2 evasion, +2 strength.

speed_powder.name: Speed Powder
speed_powder.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Suffer 2 brain damage. Gain +1 speed token. Use once per showdown.

steadfast_potion.name: Steadfast Potion
steadfast_potion.desc: When you ignore a hit with Block, gain +1 strength token. When you are knocked down, lose all your +1 strength tokens.

steel_shield.name: Steel Shield
steel_shield.desc:
-3 movement.
Spend a or survival to ignore a hit.

steel_sword.name: Steel Sword
steel_sword.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +1d10 strength for the rest of the attack.

stone_noses.name: Stone Noses
stone_noses.desc:
On Arrival, gain +1 survival, +1 insanity.
Arrival: At the start of the showdown.

sun_lure_and_hook.name: Sun Lure and Hook
sun_lure_and_hook.desc: When you depart, gain +1 survival. After Hunt Phase setup, place the Sky Fishing event on any space.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, do not draw a hit location. Monster suffers 1 wound.

sunshark_arrows.name: Sunshark Arrows
sunshark_arrows.desc: Activation Limit 3: May activate this up to 3 times per showdown (use tokens to track).

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains +4 strength and <b>slow</>.

sunspot_dart.name: Sunspot Dart
sunspot_dart.desc: When you hit, there is an inspiring flash! Survivors adjacent to the monster gain +1 survival.

sunspot_lantern.name: Sunspot Lantern
sunspot_lantern.desc: You cast a 1 space shadow directly away from the monster. If the shadow can be cast in two spaces, decide which space has it until you move.

sword_of_silence.name: Sword of Silence
sword_of_silence.desc: Gains Sharp if you have 5+ understanding. While your settlement has this sword, ignore g White Secret and g White Speaker.

tabard.name: Tabard
tabard.desc: When you are encouraged, gain +1 insanity if your settlement is Barbaric or gain +1 survival if your settlement is Romantic.

talon_knife.name: Talon Knife
talon_knife.desc: If all of your attack rolls hit, gain Savage and Deadly until the end of your attack.

teleric_eye_tac.name: Teleric Eye Tac
teleric_eye_tac.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Roll 3 hit location dice and note the results. The next time you are hit, use one of these results. (Discard the remaining noted results.)

crafting_process: Spin Circlet on Lion Tail until lens comes free. Invert the lens and replace in Circlet.
Melt Golden Whiskers with Heat to form focal point beads to hang on back.
Soak the work in Ammonia to provide rigidity and give color.

tempered_axe.name: Tempered Axe
tempered_axe.desc: When you use Axe Specialization, your second attempt to wound the selected hit location gains Sharp.

crafting_process: Hollow out Bone Axe by soaking in Ammonia and scraping with bone tools.
Combine marrow and scrap into a steaming slurry using Scrap Smelting. Beware of fumes.
Coat entire axe with steaming slurry and fill hollow head with scrap for heft.

tempered_dagger.name: Tempered Dagger
tempered_dagger.desc: While using Dagger Specialization, you may discard all other drawn hit locations to gain that much luck for your second attempt to wound that hit location.

crafting_process: Consult a disgruntled aesthete complaining about Scrap Dagger design.
Combine marrow and scrap into a steaming slurry using Scrap Smelting. Beware of fumes.
Soften Scrap Dagger in slurry and fully reform. Sharpen with Founding Stone.

affinity_bonus.desc: Add +1 to your Spear Specialization roll results with this weapon

crafting_process: Drive a pointed bone into the tang of the Scrap Sword, splintering it.
Combine marrow and scrap into a steaming slurry using Scrap Smelting. Beware of fumes.
Use steaming slurry and Bone Club to reform sword into a multi-pointed blade.

the_beetle_bomb.name: The Beetle Bomb
the_beetle_bomb.desc: a: If adjacent to the monster, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster gains -1 accuracy and -1 evasion tokens. Limit, once per showdown.

the_weaver.name: The Weaver
the_weaver.desc: When you wound a monster, add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to a random hit location.

throwing_knife.name: Throwing Knife
throwing_knife.desc: At the end of your attack, gain +1 accuracy token for each Perfect hit. When knocked down, remove all your +1 accuracy tokens.

thunder_maul.name: Thunder Maul
thunder_maul.desc: On a Perfect hit, the monster is knocked down. Suffer a severe arm injury. All non-deaf survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

tool_belt.name: Tool Belt
tool_belt.desc:
If you have no weapons in your gear grid, gain +3 evasion.
Tools in your gear grid lose frail. Tools with attack profiles gain +1 speed, +3 accuracy and sharp.

trash_crown.name: Trash Crown
trash_crown.desc: a: Reveal the next 4 hit location cards and discard 3 that are not traps. Place remaining cards on top of the deck in any order.

twilight_revolver.name: Twilight Revolver
twilight_revolver.desc: c a and 1 survival: Make an attack using this weapon. This attack has Range 3 and gains -2 Accuracy, +5 speed. Ignore e WOUND for this attack. Limit, once per showdown.

twilight_sword.name: Twilight Sword
twilight_sword.desc:
Gains Devastating 2 when fighting the Watcher.
* Accuracy is 9 - Twilight Sword proficiency level.

twilight_thong.name: Twilight Thong
twilight_thong.desc: Its fabric responds to you; stress causes INTENSE constriction. Do not suffer brain traumas (ignore this if you have destroyed genitals).

vault_key_earrings.name: Vault Key Earrings
vault_key_earrings.desc: While you have this in your gear grid, choose one of your disorders and ignore its effects.

crafting_process: Consult with a survior that has Fear of the Dark to understand the key's shape.
Heat and fold the Broken Lantern innards to shape a key that unlocks the mind.
Brush thin coats of Cyclops Fly paste with fur armor bristles.

vespertine_arrow.name: Vespertine Arrow
vespertine_arrow.desc: Archive after use. If your attack misses, place a Flower Patch terrain tile adjacent to the monster.

vespertine_bow.name: Vespertine Bow
vespertine_bow.desc: Before each attack, you may choose for Vespertine Bow to have slow, +4 accuracy, and Range: 9 for that attack.

vespertine_cello.name: Vespertine Cello
vespertine_cello.desc: At start of showdown, all other survivors with an instrument in their gear grid gain +1 luck token.

vespertine_foil.name: Vespertine Foil
vespertine_foil.desc: At the beginning of each settlement phase, archive this unless you spend 1 Flower resource.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains deadly 2.

vibrant_lantern.name: Vibrant Lantern
vibrant_lantern.desc: You may archive this to gain 1 Broken Lantern basic resource and 1 survival.

vixen_tail.name: Vixen Tail
vixen_tail.desc: The bushy tail heightens your awareness. If you are insane, you cannot be ambushed.

crafting_process: Retrieve the fur baby blanket saved from 🔖 Infant Adrift.
Use a Crab Spider to eat vicious mites that have burrowed in the fur blanket.
Comb and fluff fur, then lightly oil with Monster Grease.

whisker_harp.name: Whisker Harp
whisker_harp.desc:
On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 survival.
a: Strum, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+ discard 1 mood currently in play.

whistling_mace.name: Whistling Mace
whistling_mace.desc:
On a Perfect hit, reveal the next AI card. Place it on top or bottom of the AI deck.
Unwieldy: If any attack roll results are 1, you hit yourself and suffer 1 damage.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you Sideswipe, gain +1 accuracy and +5 strength for your attack next this turn

white_lion_armor_set.name: White Lion Armor Set
white_lion_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Your weapons are your claws! Gain +1 speed and +2 strength when attacking with daggers or katars.

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 movement

white_lion_coat.name: White Lion Coat
white_lion_coat.desc: Pounce: Spend c and a to move 3 spaces in a straight line. Then, if you moved 3 spaces, activate a melee weapon with +1 strength.

white_lion_gauntlets.name: White Lion Gauntlet
white_lion_gauntlets.desc: When you Pounce, gain +1 accuracy for your next attack this turn.

affinity_bonus.desc: a and 1 survival: Roar. Non-Deaf Insane survivors gain +2 strength until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.
Play the showdown with the top card of the hit location deck revealed.

xmaxe.name: Xmaxe
xmaxe.desc: This weapon's strength is equal to your current insanity.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Devastating 1: Whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.
